entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
